definition.value: Odi nkonim: Woayɛ nsakrae wɔ Parcelforce 48 a wɔde mena no mu!

Parcelforce 48 Rates:
Example: 0:0,10:15.99,12:19.99, - Nneɛma a emu duru nnu anaa ɛne nkaribo 10 yɛ pɛ no bɛyɛ $15.99, Ne mu duru nnu nkaribo 12 nanso ɛboro nkaribo 10 bɛbɔ $19.99. Faako a Pound yɛ wo Store Weight class na $ yɛ Store Base sika. Wubetumi asesa abien no nyinaa wɔ Store Settings no mu. Mfa KG anaa agyiraehyɛde biara nhyɛ mu. Hyehyɛ botae ahorow a ɛkɔ 5,2 decimal mmeae. (12345.67) na ɛyɛ.

Display Delivery Weight:
Wopɛ sɛ wokyerɛ sɛnea wɔde nneɛma mena? (sɛ nhwɛso no, Nneɛma a Wɔde Kɔma no Mu duru : 2.7674 Kg's)

Display Insurance:
So wopɛ sɛ wokyerɛ insurance a ɛfa nneɛma a wɔde mena ho? (sɛ nhwɛso no, Insured upto 500)

Display Delivery Time:
Wopɛ sɛ wokyerɛ bere a wode bɛmena? (sɛ nhwɛso no, Wɔde mena wɔ nnafua 3 kosi 5 ntam)

Parcelforce48 Akatua Boɔ:
Hyehyɛ botaeɛ a ɛkɔ 5,2 decimal mmeaeɛ. (12345.67) Nhwɛsoɔ: 34:0,100:1,250:2.25 - Insurance cover ma cart values upto 34 bɛbɔ ka 0.00 foforɔ, saa values no bɛboro 100 na upto 250 no bɛbɔ ka 2.25 extra. Mfa sika agyiraehyɛde ahorow nhyɛ mu.
Kɔkɔbɔ: Wonni kwan sɛ wobɛsesa Parcelforce 48 shipping!
